name: 100 Hidden Cats in USA
description:
100 Cats in USA - Join the cutest adventure in the USA! Explore the charming and amazing USA Lanscapes as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Can you find them all?

features
1 Level
100 cats
Amazing USA Landscapes
Pan and Zoom
Continues Updates
Relaxing Soundtack
Meow cat sounds
